com.indra.iquality.dao

Interface CertificacionDeNegocioDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CertificacionDeNegocioDAOJDBCTemplateImpl

    public interface CertificacionDeNegocioDAO
    The Interface to interact with the persistent representations of business certifications. See CertificacionDeNegocio.
    Version:
    0.1, 09/12/15
    Author:
    Ignacio N. Lucero Ascencio

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<CertificacionDeNegocio> getAll()
      Gets all the records of business certifications.
      java.util.List<DetalleDeCertificacion> getDetallesDeCertificacion(java.lang.String idMes, java.lang.String idMetrica, int qttHeaders)
      Gets the details for an instance of CertificacionDeNegocio.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getHeadersDetalles(java.lang.String idMetrica)
      Gets the headers of the required fields to represent a detailed view of a CertificacionDeNegocio.

    • Method Detail

      • getAll

        java.util.List<CertificacionDeNegocio> getAll()
        Gets all the records of business certifications.
        Returns:
        all the business certifications for the current system and software version

      • getHeadersDetalles

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getHeadersDetalles(java.lang.String idMetrica)
        Gets the headers of the required fields to represent a detailed view of a CertificacionDeNegocio. Headers are dynamic, i.e., their content and amount may vary for different instances of CertificacionDeNegocio.
        Parameters:
        idMetrica - the identifier for an instance of CertificacionDeNegocio
        Returns:
        a list of headers for the detailed view

      • getDetallesDeCertificacion

        java.util.List<DetalleDeCertificacion> getDetallesDeCertificacion(java.lang.String idMes,
                                                                  java.lang.String idMetrica,
                                                                  int qttHeaders)
        Gets the details for an instance of CertificacionDeNegocio.
        Parameters:
        idMes - the month for which we want the details
        idMetrica - the identifier for an instance of CertificacionDeNegocio
        qttHeaders - the amount of fields the detailed view has; see getHeadersDetalles(String idMetrica)
        Returns:
        a list of all the details of a business certification
